hero.title: The future of composting management with xCarbon
hero.description: Developing a SAAS platform that will optimize the composting process with AI, automate carbon credit creation, and maximize operational efficiency.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Our platform integrates all the necessary tools to optimize the management of composting plants

monitoring.title: Real-time monitoring
monitoring.description: Complete control of all composting processes in a unified and intuitive interface.

analytics.title: Advanced data analysis
analytics.description: Visualization of KPIs and key metrics to optimize plant operations.

resources.title: Resource management
resources.description: Efficient planning of resources, personnel, and machinery to maximize productivity.

traceability.title: Complete traceability
traceability.description: Tracking of the complete cycle from organic waste to final compost and carbon credits.

compliance.title: Regulatory compliance
compliance.description: We ensure compliance with all environmental regulations and Spanish legal requirements.

reports.title: Custom reports
reports.description: Generation of detailed reports on performance, sustainability, and carbon footprint.

ai.title: AI for composting transformation
ai.description: At xCarbon, artificial intelligence is not an add-on, but the core of our value proposition. Our technology constantly learns to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and maximize production.
ai.roadmap_description: includes increasingly sophisticated algorithms for outcome prediction, resource optimization, and automatic generation of data-based reports.

algorithms.title: Predictive algorithms
algorithms.description: We use deep learning models to predict optimal composting conditions, maturation time, and compost quality.

optimization.title: Process optimization
optimization.description: Our algorithms continuously analyze data to identify opportunities for improvement in the composting process and reduce processing times.

automation.title: Intelligent automation
automation.description: Automated systems that adjust parameters such as aeration, humidity, and temperature in real-time based on data and predictive models.

carbonCredits.title: Carbon Credits Generation and Tokenization
carbonCredits.description: We convert efficient organic waste management into verifiable and tradable digital assets

verification.title: Automated verification
verification.description: Our platform performs accurate calculations of CO2 emission reductions based on real data from composting processes and international standards.

tokenization.title: Tokenization
tokenization.description: We convert verified carbon credits into digital tokens backed by real emission reductions, creating a sustainable and transparent asset.

marketplace.title: Proprietary marketplace
marketplace.description: We offer an integrated market where companies and organizations can acquire verified carbon credits, directly supporting sustainable composting projects.

impact.title: Environmental impact
impact.description: Each token represents a real contribution to the fight against climate change, transforming waste into resources and reducing the global carbon footprint.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At xCarbon we are committed to transforming organic waste management in Spain through cutting-edge technology, actively contributing to the circular economy and the fight against climate change.
mission.paragraph2: Our vision is to turn each composting plant into a sustainable innovation center that not only reduces waste, but generates economic and environmental value through the production of high-quality compost and verifiable carbon credits.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Commitment to practices that favor the environment and reduce the carbon footprint.

innovation.title: Technological innovation
innovation.description: Constant development of solutions that leverage technology to solve environmental problems.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Verifiable and traceable data in all our processes and in the generation of carbon credits.

impact.title: Social impact
impact.description: Creating value for the communities where plants using our technology operate.

roadmap.title: Our Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: We are in full development to revolutionize the composting sector in Spain
roadmap.mockupDescription: Our development team is working hard to build a state-of-the-art composting management platform that will revolutionize the industry.

descriptions.start: First proof of concept tests and ideation.
descriptions.app05: Applied to a composting plant. Basic process management.
descriptions.carbon: Automatic generation of documentation for carbon credits.

extendedDescriptions.start: We assembled our founding team, conducted extensive market research, and developed the initial xCarbon concept. We identified key industry problems and began designing our solution architecture.
extendedDescriptions.poc: We successfully implemented our first testing environment at a medium-sized composting facility in Madrid. This allowed us to gather critical operational data, refine our algorithms, and validate our core value proposition.
extendedDescriptions.app05: The first working version of the xCarbon platform deployed with basic monitoring functions, initial data collection, and simplified reporting tools. Early users are experiencing productivity improvements and gaining insights into their operations.
extendedDescriptions.app1: Complete platform release with comprehensive features for managing multiple plants, advanced analytics dashboard, and enhanced resource planning tools.
extendedDescriptions.gov: Integrated reporting capabilities with government environmental agencies for streamlined compliance and certifications.
extendedDescriptions.carbon: Fully automated carbon credit calculation, verification and tokenization process with blockchain integration.

roadmap.looking: We are looking for partners and composting plants interested in participating in our pilot tests.

partners.title: Join the xCarbon ecosystem
partners.description: We're actively building partnerships with composting facilities, sustainability-focused organizations, and investors who share our vision of transforming waste management through technology.
partners.compostingDesc: We're looking for plants of all sizes interested in optimizing their operations and exploring new revenue streams through carbon credits.
partners.investorsDesc: Connect with us if you're interested in supporting the next generation of environmental technology with significant market potential.
partners.quote: Together we can transform the composting industry while fighting climate change and generating new revenue streams.

cta.title: Be part of the composting revolution
cta.description: We are looking for composting plants in Spain for our pilot program. Be among the first to optimize your processes and explore the potential of carbon credits with xCarbon.

footer.description: Transforming the management of composting plants with advanced technology, AI, and carbon credit tokenization.
